message.body: Did such a good job watching the dog.. that's whyhe chewed up steph's hat
How long has the air been on 74?
I took it off him and put it on the sofa. I don't know where he got it from.
Last night
I forgot to change it back
Ok well you left it on. Air is to be off or raised to 76-78 the second you wake.
And why does it look like a party took place? No one is allowed over when we are away
No one was here except Eden. What do you mean a party? Everything lying around th house was there when we got there
Just bec beer and pizza... and the trash was taken out early.why is it in the porch?
Idk if it was you or marc but twinkies and smartoned are for my baking. Someone ate those too
And you didn't tell us we were out of detergent. I needed to wash work clothes when I got home.

I didn't have beer. That was already there when I got there the firs night. Me and Eden didn't have pizza. Unless you're talking about the frozen pizza bread box. I also didn't eat twinkies or smarties. Eden asked for one and I said no cause they were for your baking. The detergent was basically out before I used it this morning. I used the last drops. Meant to tell you before I left for work but forgot.
So then it was marc?
I also didn't take out trash
Do you know if he had anyone over?
And I'm not coming down on just you. I'm irked right now. Dog chewed #### up and air was left on so it just all snowballed. I'm getting marc now tho

The beer and pizza probably was marc. I didn't notice a pizza box and just thought the beer was yours or steph's. I didn't see much of marc. When I got back from work sunday night he was on the step and then left to sleep at his bosses. Didn't see him all day yesterday until last night but he just went to bed
And yeah its annoying that the dog chews stuff up. You should leave it out of his reach
No we don't really keep beer.. and there is pizza in tin foil in the fridge. I bunch of tradh in our recycle bin like beer cans and a trash bag in the porch
The pizza in tin foil is mine from work. I brought it home last night but didn't bring a box with it
The hat was on the banister. Someone human had toknock it down andhe only chews stuff when left alone. I already told you if he isn't up your ### he is doing something wrong.
Those two slices were left over from work and I brought it home in the tin foil already
He follows everyone. If you are not yelling at him to move then ge is doing something
Ok so just the beer is marc's.
There's a lot of paper towels in the trash. That was me. I had to clean up his poop and he also spit up on the rug
Yeah
Well I'm assuming
Lot of paper towelsin this current trash? No I mean the huge recycle bin in the porch is filled. It was empty when we left and there is a white trash bag in the porch next to it.
Kitchen recycle bin is empty
Oh no I didn't touch that
I didn't empty that. It wad full. Unless Eden emptied it without me knowing
And since when are my friends not allowed over when you're not home?
I doubt it was eden. It was marc. He put the beer box in the trash bag and trash in the porch. I don't like that. That can draw bugs... I'm over this texting, are you coming home tonight?

And its not that.. I'm annoyed that no one in this house wants to listen. Like I said I come home to what looks like the dog unwatched, trash out and beer cans. Looked careless. But if your friends are over that's fine
Steph and i were annoyed with how it seemed but When you come home I want to talk to you. Told marc the same

Okay. I did do everything I was told though. I watched the dog, fed him, and watched spike. I forgot to raise the air this morning and think I forgot to put spike's light back to white this morning (which you should check on if you didn't yet). But other than that I followed the rules. I wouldn't trash a house. I don't like leaving a place in a condition other than the one it was in before I got there.
I do come home tonight. But I get done work at 11.
So I should be there sound midnight.
*around

Ok honestly I'm not mad at you. Just with the air on I was hoping it wasn't on all Weekend like that. Our bill last time was $300 (normal is $85-90)... you see the difference and the dog eating things. But not mad at you... marc on the other hand is in trouble
Okay
